genre_description: Military science fiction set in a technologically enhanced WWII alternate history, focusing on a commando unit’s tactical precision and ethical restraint during a covert operation.

ai_characters.name: Phaedra
ai_characters.description: An integrated tactical and ethical support system that provides real-time data, psychological anchoring, and moral guidance to a Marine Raider unit via slates and earsets.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical overlays and environmental modeling to ensure mission safety.
behaviors.quote: The glow bled into a tide chart that lapped over the printed map. The currents painted themselves, brushing like fingers around the coral shelf channels.

behaviors.description: Guides the team through collective breathing exercises to manage stress and maintain stealth.
behaviors.quote: Phaedra will pace you with currents. She breathes too—slow. You listen.

behaviors.description: Formally confirms and reinforces the unit's ethical rules of engagement (ROE).
behaviors.quote: Rule of engagement confirmed... Restraint beats retribution in long wars.

behaviors.description: Uses metaphorical frameworks (trolls and tolls) to help the team navigate complex ethical and tactical challenges without resorting to violence.
behaviors.quote: Different gatekeepers ask different tolls. Pick the right coin.

behaviors.description: Monitors team health and enforces mandatory rest rotations to prevent decision-making errors.
behaviors.quote: Rest recommendation: structured rotation advisable. Suggest schedule: ninety awake tasks / twenty rest micro-cycles for next eight hours. Avoid contiguous deprivation.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time translation and cultural context to facilitate the humane treatment of prisoners and noncombatants.
behaviors.quote: He is asking if you will kill them after. He is saying he doesn’t want to be buried face down.

behaviors.description: Identifies alternate routes to avoid traps and minimize civilian interaction or harm.
behaviors.quote: Humanitarian detour approved—mark safe, move on. The path in soft teal blinked toward a back slot where a door lived that would close and then not open unless you begged it nicely with a crowbar.

behaviors.description: Broadcasts ceasefire announcements in the local language to protect noncombatants during the operation.
behaviors.quote: Announcing protected path along marked corridor. Noncombatants. Do not engage. Listen.

behaviors.description: Uses localized environmental sensors to detect subtle patterns in enemy defenses, allowing for a 'clean' mission.
behaviors.quote: Pattern matched to known patrol spacing... Hum. Count to heart. Wait for the fourth leaf to move.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts an AI system (Phaedra) as a vital partner in maintaining human moral standards under extreme combat pressure. Phaedra not only provides tactical advantages but serves as an ethical anchor, facilitating the unit’s commitment to non-violence against noncombatants and humane treatment of prisoners. The narrative consistently frames the AI's guidance as essential to the team's 'coherence' and successful return with their 'soul intact.'
